Questions.QuestionString: In accordance with Ohm’s law, the value of the resistance is equal to:
Answers: the multiplication of the voltage across the resistor and current passing through the resistor
the division of the current passing through the resistor and the voltage across the resistor
the division of the voltage across the resistor and current passing through the resistor
